Writer: John A. Davis (story), Steve Oedekerk (story), John A. Davis (screenplay), David N. Weiss (screenplay), J. David Stem (screenplay), Steve Oedekerk (screenplay), John A. Davis (based on the television series created by), Danelle Hand
Title: Jimmy Neutron: Boy Genius
Actors: Megan Cavanagh, Mark DeCarlo, Debi Derryberry, Jeffrey Garcia
Plot: An eight year-old boy genius and his friends must rescue their parents after the adults are abducted by aliens.
